data.title: Bravo 111 bus
data.meta_description: See next departure times, schedules, route maps and all stop locations for the 111
data.text:
Bravo 111 bus Stop List and Next Departures

The Bravo 111 - Steenbergen via Dinteloord - Roosendaal bus serves {count_of_stops} bus stops in the North Brabant area departing from {first_stop} and ending at {last_stop}. Scroll down to see upcoming 111 bus times at each stop and the next scheduled 111 bus times will be displayed. The full 111 bus schedule as well as real-time departures (if available) can be found in the Transit app.

The Bravo 111 - Steenbergen via Dinteloord - Roosendaal bus route map is shown above. The route map shows you an overview of all the stops served by the Bravo 111 bus to help you plan your trip on Bravo. Opening the app will allow you to see more detailed information about the route on a map including stop specific alerts, such as stops that have been closed or moved. You can also see the location of vehicles in real-time on the route map so you know when the 111 bus is approaching your stop.

See the detailed route map

Bravo 111 bus Service Alerts

Open the Transit app to see more information about any active disruptions that may impact the 111 bus schedule, such as detours, moved stops, trip cancellations, major delays, or other service changes to the bus route. The app also allows you to subscribe to receive notifications for any service alert issued by Bravo so that you can plan your trip around any active or future disruptions.

See all alerts

Bravo 111 bus Service Frequency

The next 111 bus leaves {first_stop} at {first_stop_first_time}, and arrives at {last_stop} at {last_stop_first_time}. You can see the frequency of upcoming trips and the exact departure times by opening the Transit app.

See all departures

Bravo 111 bus On-Time Performance

Want to know whether the Bravo 111 bus arrives on time? Open the Transit app and view user generated on-time performance reports for the 111 bus. You can also contribute your own reports on whether your trip arrived on time, late or early. As these on-time performance stats are user reported, they may differ from official Bravo metrics.

See all on-time perfomance details
